results.title: The Effect of Metformin on Chemotherapy-Induced Toxicities in Non-diabetic Breast Cancer Patients: A Randomised Controlled Study
results.text_hl: The protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Stomatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013280 @@@oral mucositis@@@ caused by AC-T chemotherapy regimen, has not been investigated in preclinical or clinical settings.

citations.NLM: Serageldin MA, Kassem AB, El-Kerm Y, Helmy MW, El-Mas MM, El-Bassiouny NA. The Effect of Metformin on Chemotherapy-Induced Toxicities in Non-diabetic Breast Cancer Patients: A Randomised Controlled Study Drug Saf. 2023 Jun;46(6):587-599. PMID: 37131014
citations.BibTeX: @article{37131014, title={The Effect of Metformin on Chemotherapy-Induced Toxicities in Non-diabetic Breast Cancer Patients: A Randomised Controlled Study}, author={Serageldin MA and Kassem AB and El-Kerm Y and Helmy MW and El-Mas MM and El-Bassiouny NA}, journal={Drug Saf}, volume={46}, number={6}, pages={587-599}}

results.title: Metformin protects 5-Fu-induced chemotherapy oral mucositis by reducing endoplasmic reticulum stress in mice.
results.text_hl: However, whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ has a protective effect on chemotherapy-induced @<m>DISEASE_Stomatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013280 @@@oral mucositis@@@(CIOM) is unknown.

citations.NLM: Sun H, Zhou Y, Ma R, Zhang J, Shan J, Chen Y, Li X, Shan E. Metformin protects 5-Fu-induced chemotherapy oral mucositis by reducing endoplasmic reticulum stress in mice. Eur J Pharm Sci. 2022 Jun 1;173():106182. PMID: 35405270
